heroes.abilityDescription: Each pancake consumed levels him up by one

heroes.abilityDescription: Deploys a turret for additional firepower

heroes.abilityDescription: Taunts nearby enemies and gains a shield

newEvolutions.name: Royal Hogs Evolution
newEvolutions.description: Flying Pigs - Deploy as flying troops with rainbow trails, immune to ground attacks. Crash landing deals area damage on buildings. After landing, behave like normal Royal Hogs.
newEvolutions.baseStats: Same as regular Royal Hogs (HP and damage)

nerfs.change: Speedup Allies percentage reduced from 50% to 30%
Close Quarters Damage reduced from 294 to 268

tracks.name: Diamond Pass
tracks.description: Premium track with enhanced rewards including Hero Boxes (Arena 15+)

rework.heroBoxes: Players at Arena 15 and above gain access to monthly Heroes and Hero Boxes
